channel.title: CVE Feed for SENEC -- Storage Box V1
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SENEC -- Storage Box V1

item.title: CVE-2023-39169|2024-08-02T18:02:05.231Z -- senec -- storage%20box%20v1
item.description: The affected devices use publicly available default credentials with administrative privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-39167|2024-08-02T18:02:06.516Z -- senec -- storage%20box%20v1
item.description: InÂ SENEC Storage Box V1,V2 and V3 an unauthenticated remote attacker can obtain the devices' logfiles that contain sensitive data.

item.title: CVE-2023-39172|2024-08-02T18:02:06.458Z -- senec -- storage%20box%20v1
item.description: The affected devices transmit sensitive information unencrypted allowing a remote unauthenticated attacker to capture and modify network traffic.

item.title: CVE-2023-39171|2024-08-02T18:02:06.728Z -- senec -- storage%20box%20v1
item.description: SENEC Storage Box V1,V2 and V3 accidentially expose a management UI accessible with publicly known admin credentials.
